tool_description: API showing oil news from selected sources
name: Test Oil news
title: Test Oil news

api_list.name: Get All Oil News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about oil from chosen sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://test-oil-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "test-oil-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source Oil News
api_list.description: Get News about Oil from a specific news resource (guardian, cnbc, wsj, times)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://test-oil-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/cnbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "test-oil-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://test-oil-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "test-oil-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
